subject: Football (College)
lead_paragraph: Clemson allowed 20 straight points, evoking memories of their 2012 Orange Bowl loss, but took the lead for good midway through the fourth quarter on Tajh Boyd’s fifth touchdown pass.
snippet: Clemson allowed 20 straight points, evoking memories of their 2012 Orange Bowl loss, but took the lead for good midway through the fourth quarter on Tajh Boyd’s fifth touchdown pass.
